text: Andrés García (May 24, 1941 - April 4, 2023) was a Dominican-Mexican actor. He was one of the more popular and well known actors in Mexico and Latin America. He was known for appearing in many telenovelas. He appeared as Pedro Jose Donoso in El cuerpo del deseo and Javier in Mujeres engañadas. His career began in 1967. He also played Davis in King of Texas. ==Death== García died from hypovolemic shock caused by cirrhosis on April 4, 2023 in Acapulco, Mexico at the age of 81.Muere Andrés García tras su lucha contra la cirrosis hepática == Filmography == *2007: El Pantera ....
